findings.title: CPC-01 Hardcode Decimal
findings.description: Using hardcode decimal `1e12` in the token related calculation may cause calculation error.

findings.title: CPC-02 Missing Check for Reentrancy Attack
findings.description: Missing check for reentrancy attack vulnerability.

findings.title: CPC-03 Missing Event for Significant Action
findings.description: Missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain liquidity fee changes. An event should be emitted for significant actions calling `add()` .

findings.title: CPC-05 Missing Check for Transfer Result
findings.description: Missing check for transfer result in CrossPool.sol contract

findings.title: MCK-01 Edge Case for Non-Contract Caller Check
findings.description: Edge case vulnerability allowing non-contract callers, potentially enabling reentrancy attacks.
